column4: Im a new linux user, i downloaded the ubuntu.iso burned it to a disc and restarted. the disc is fine and then when it gets to the ubuntu startup screen the disc light keeps lighting but nothing happens (for hours) anybody know why?
have you had problems with your disc drive before?
hmm... i'm kind of new myself, but just so I understand, this boot screen is halting when it's booting to the partition, and not when it's still booting off the disc?
and which disc light are we talkign about: the rom or the HD?
